book.title: Black Night
book.description: Feyre has undergone more trials than one human woman can carry in her heart. Though she's now been granted the powers and lifespan of the High Fae she is haunted by her time Under the Mountain and the terrible deeds she performed to save the lives of Tamlin and his people As her marriage to Tamlin.
